name: Goldsmiths Game Design Final Project Year 1 - Fire and Ice
name_original: Goldsmiths Game Design Final Project Year 1 - Fire and Ice
description:
Hello, this is a project collaboration between me and my work partner for our final project of our 1st year Game Design course. There are two levels in this game demo.

Controls:

Arrows or WASD to move and jump

X to switch between fire (burn away trees and melt ice platforms) and ice (freeze transparent platforms)

Z to shoot magic

Known bugs:

- If you die before you touch a checkpoint you respawn but appear invisible

- Sometime enemies will be invincible when they're not supposed to be (like the fire enemy in stage 2, only supposed to be immune to fire and also weak to ice)
